WRITING.TEXT: Pudge animations -- Hook, tp, spawn, run, attack and victory. Not 100% sure.

There are a lot of good mixed possibilities but I would use [This one](http://dotahattery.com/?h=alchemist id[]=5341 id[]=7627 id[]=6456 id[]=5340 id[]=4945 id[]=6120).
